title: Boston Police: Man shot, killed in Dorchester neighborhood - Houston Chronicle
text: Boston Police: Man shot, killed in Dorchester neighborhood Updated 10:26 am, Saturday, November 19, 2016 BOSTON (AP) â€” Boston Police say a man was shot and killed in the city's Dorchester neighborhood. New England Cable News reports ( http://bit.ly/2faIHYP ) that police were called to Normandy Street around 3 a.m. Saturday and found a man in his late 20s with an apparent gunshot wound. The network reports that the man died at the scene. Police are investigating. No arrests have been made. Police are asking anyone with information to contact the Homicide Unit. Latest News Video
